reviewText: I was really excited when I ordered this. Finished the first season with a couple of cd's having scratches but since they still played I let it go. Now I am on season 2 and the amount of scratches on the cd's are so bad some of the shows won't even play.  I'm going to have to return it and hope they can send a good copy back to me.

Regarding first review...Understandably, I would be extrememly unhappy if I received that type of service as well.
However, I did want to write a review for the show, so as not to give anyone the impression that the show deserves 1 star.
Criminal Minds is a great crime/procedural show. Most episodes are very intriguing and as the show has developed so have the charcters. You learn a little more about them each season, which I think has helped make the show even more interesting. If you enjoy a good crime/procedural show with great characters or if you are already a Criminal Minds fan, this is a great buy! And considering the how many seasons are included, the price is very reasonable.
I HAVE NOT RECEIVED THIS ITEM YET AND IT HAS BEEN A MONTH AND A HALF. NEEDLESS TO SAY I AM VERY UNHAPPY AND LOOKING FOR RESULTS.

I had watched many episodes on television, but all were out of order.  Since I love the series. I decided trder the complete seasons.  Problem was one episode on each disc, something was wrong.  I contacted the seller and told him about it and he said return it and it would be replaced with another.  I did this, but had written what disc was defected with black ink. He returned it back again stating that they could not accept  the back because of the writing on the disc.  All he had to do was take a tissue and wipe my writing off.  Will not purchase from them again, and recommend that others do the same.
Have watched the show since the beginning.  Always watch the whole dvd set in one setting.  Love characters and stories usually.
I love criminal minds, now I can watch them anytime. I will continue to buy them in the future. Thank you
great TV series. The show has an Interesting focus on the psychological aspect of serial killers. looking forward to next season

I was lucky to get this set  about a year ago, and pay only around $89.00 !! Amazon is incredible! You really have to "watch" the item that you want because the prices fluctuate often! I looked  again three days later at this set, and the price had gone up to about $129.00! Trying now to again get lucky with 7 & 8 :)

These CD's arrived in good time and in good shape.  Season 1 plays very well, I will have to report later on the other seasons.  They all came vacuum packed and appear new.  Covers, cases and CD's are all in outstanding shape.
Packaged well, it was everything I have come to expect from Amazon DVD's I certainly recomment this product for your collection. To my surprise Season 7 arrived in the set :-)
Great DVD's. Loved being able to watch episodes I loved in the order I would prefer to. Liked hearing star's comments.

This is a great series, and this is an awesome way to get a bunch of them all at once.  Bought this last Black Friday before I headed off to work in the early hours of the morning.  Awesome buy, we love it!

My mother-in-law bought this set for me for Christmas and worked fine at first, but I got a new laptop (my old one crashed) and they will not play on it because the DVD set I was sent was set for regions 2, 4, & 5 (Western Europe, Middle East, South Africa, & Japan; South America, Central America, & Australia; and the former USSR & Africa respectively).  What a load of crap!  This wasn't an issue on my old laptop, but all the new laptops have DVD regions set on them to prevent piracy and now I can't play the DVDs that were legally purchased in the US!  I am extremely disappointed and will never buy DVDs or CDs off Amazon again!

P.S.  new DVD players have DVD region limits too, so you may end up with DVDs that can't be played in the US or devices set to be played only in the US.
I love how they profile serial killers and how they catch them.  They also save some of the people even though some have to die.
Only at season 2 so far but love this show. arrived at the house quick and was in great shape. felt like a got a great deal for this entire set.
This was a great buy, and Awesome Series.

Very upset! Got this for christmas from my boyfriend and at least one disc in each season is scratched. I can't watch half of it. Its supposed to be brand new so I'd like to know how that happened? I have no way of returning it so I don't know what to do. Not Happy.
This show just keeps getting better and better.  The only problem I have now is that it's so addictive I need season 7 already.
This arrived today. - 2 days before the earliest estimated date. It looks like it's brand new! So excited! I love this show
This is also that best series ever....I only watch a few shows on tv and this is one of them.  I love watching it over and over again.
Love this show!  Wish I could get the rest of the seasons for this low of a price.  Criminal Minds rocks!

Got hooked on Criminal Minds showing on Monday and Tuesday nights on a cable station.  Now I can "catch-up" with all the beginning episodes!  And at a great price to boot!  It's a win-win situation.  Thank you Amazon!
The wife and I love this show. We had every episode on VHS prior purchasing this set. The wife is now getting rid of the VHS tapes.
Love Criminal Minds, so glad to have the majority of it on DVD. Shipping was fast and efficient. Everything was as specified.
We love Criminal Minds!  I got this set for my boyfriends birthday and he was very pleasantly surprised!  We watch this show all the time!
For those who love mysteries this is a great series. Was a gift for a family member because she loves the series, she was delighted.
Makes for a great gift! My wife absolutely loves this show! I got it on black friday so the price was right
Love this series. The acting and actors are great. Have ordered the eighth season and will order the ninth season also.
It works great, I don't think it could have been better even if I had got it fro a store.
All seasons except 5 came as a boxed set.  I don't know if that was just how they were boxed for that particular season but that wasn't what we expected...

I don't even have a tracking number!!

NO RESPECT FOR I ALL NTERNATIONAL BUYERS. I WOULD BE RESPECTFUL TO NOTIFY ME

You could at least contact the CUSTOMER!!!

I was sad when the 6th Season ended, wanted more! I have Season
Seven, am on the wait list for Season Eight, guess you could say I really liked it!

If you are reading this you know how amazing Criminal Minds is! I bought this one night after watching a rerun on TV and then didn't have the sequel on my DVR so I bought all the seasons this show is amazing the set was amazing! My Season 1 had 2 disc ones, but after contacting the seller to inform him/her they refunded my money so I could purchase that season locally! Great seller! Awesome series!

What's to say.  A great series, though I can't watch too many of them at night without having a restless night.  I love the character development, and it will be nice to see it from the beginning since I didn't hit this gem until about season three.
What a great deal. I got 6 seasons all from 1 vendor. I checked stores & wasn't able to find these & cheap price too.
Got a very good price on this for black friday. I had been watching the price for over a year. Usually not worth buying all together (better to buy separate).
What a terrific ensemble and as much as I hate to say it - because of its violent nature - there are some very creative plots.
i BOUGHT THIS FOR A CHRISTMAS PRESENT I REALLY LIKE THIS SHOW HOPE SHE LIKES IT  AS WELL AS I DO
Love this series, the cast is awesome, and the stories are very interesting, they really draw you in as a viewer.

The review is specifically about this product, not the series.

Season 5 comes in a different package than the rest of the six. I exchanged the product and got the same thing again. Season 5 comes in a standard DVD case while all the others have a nice shiny package that holds 3-4 slim DVD cases.
Major hit for my 11 year old grand-daughter. She loves this series and wants to work for FBI in criminal investigations.
The best series ever) Shemar Moore yum! Love the price and love the cast of criminal minds greatest show ever
great condision just the right price.and i find it here don't need to go looking for it.it arrives on time.thanks
Good gift, had no problems and it came quickly! My friend loved the gift and was ecstatic to receive it!
This is one of the top series on television at present.  Will hope to keep up with upcoming programs.  Great combination of actors/actresses.

I'm so pleased with my order, shipment and product.  Everything is perfect and I really love this show as well as the cast.  Thank you so much for having his available and I can't wait to get the last season!

A coworker got me hooked on criminal minds. I've never seen it beofre until that day and I couldn't stop watching it since! Each character is superbly played, but my favorite has to be Dr. Spencer Reid, played by Mathhew Gray Gubler.

I was watching the show on my laptop for the first 3 seasons then the dvd player is freezing up so I have to switch to using my ps3. I love the characters of criminal minds expecualy dr spencer reid he is a cutie. I am watching them all in order because I did  watch the first season when it was on tv then life happends and I missed a lot. I saw reruns of most episodes on diffrent networks and not in order. I haven't seen most of the episodes in season 5 and 6 and the begining of season 7 can't wait for that season to come out so I can buy it too.
Great purchase! Half off price- shipped much quicker than i expected!  I've watched seasons 1-5 so far with only one incident of a disk skipping.
I got such a great deal on this set! I love this show and I'm glad I didn't have to spend that much on it . :)
We enjoy this show very much and continue to watch it over and over. We go back and forth between this show, CSI, and NCIS.
Most of the DVD's that came in this package will not play and skip. They are supposed to be brand new.

If you are looking for a crime drama that transcends that cliche, this is the one for you.  With a character that will appeal to everyones liking, the FBI BAU team will have you glued to your seat each and every episode.

I just received my seasons 1-6 and within three weeks I'm already through FOUR of the seasons.  I just cannot get enough Criminal Minds.
I was really happy with how everything was packaged. It was protected and came to me in one piece. My mom can't stop watching!

Awesome TV series. many great stories and actors are great. Hard to believe as you watch and hear statistics about real serial killersthat the statistics are true and accurate. You only have heard about a few serial killers in the news thoughout life.... But google it!  There have been 100's in the USA not to mention other countries. Every day there are 30 active serial killers in the USA alone!

The series it self is great, and very entertaining. Although I wish that the first season DVD's as well as the second season DVD's had worked well. I'm not sure if it was a malfunction in the dvd's or if they were damaged in some way, but there were certain areas that could not be watched, even after cleaning my dvd player. Again the series itself is great with a well liked cast, and very entertaining.

I have watched the show for a while, but knew that I missed some episodes so I purchased the available seasons. However, I have found that I like this series so much, that I have watched episodes more than once! I am not a big TV watcher, but I love this show!!!

Santa request from my 18yr old.  While I am not thrilled to spend money on DVD's since you can buy everything online.  I granted her request and let Santa get her other gifts.  Was happy with how quick my shipment arrived and in excellent condition
I received the DVDs in a timely manner and they were in great condition. I am very pleased with my purchase!
Ordered for wife for Christmas. Received in less than a week with the entire series. Item was packaged well and contained everything as promised.

It goes without saying that this show is excellent. If you're viewing this product I will assume that you already know this. There is absolutely nothing to dislike about this television show. However, this review is for the physical boxed set, not the show itself. Be sure to checkout Wikipedia for a brief synopsis of the show if you were sent here by a friend or relative to buy a gift ([...]).

One member reported not receiving this product. I received mine the very next day; thank you Prime. Another member commented that his/her discs arrived in a condition which rendered them useless. This is certainly not the case for me. Nevertheless, the boxed set arrived well packaged and in excellent condition (no bent corners, etc.). I purchased this as a gift for the girlfriend and she could not be happier! We're both enjoying an episode...or four, every night.
One of my favorite TV shows. Service was great, got the product on time, in excellent condition. Now I have all 6 seasons, I can watch them in order over and over again! Yay!
bought this for my daughter for christmas and she loves the show. sure it will be one of her favorite presents. great service and fast shipping.
Great gift for this criminal minds fans. My wife loved it.
Good product with fast shipping and good product updates.
Good TV show
Now I can go back & watch all of the shows again & catch up on the 1s that I missed.
I LOVE THESE
Best show on TV.  Can't wait for additional series.
Product as expected
have not watched any yet. new tv is coming soon
Love them!
i bought this for my teenage daughter who has watched it all and then watched it again! Enough said, no?
